channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: I got lots of new followers on Bluesky too, did you all wonder how and why it happened? Also have any journos looked into who owns it, and who just made a big investment? Do some digging before you fall in love.
item.source:markdown: I got lots of new followers on Bluesky too, did you all wonder how and why it happened? Also have any journos looked into who owns it, and who just made a big investment? Do some digging before you fall in love.

item.description: If you're looking for a feel-good sports documentary, I recommend The Comeback on Netflix, wherein the Boston Red Sox finally win the World Series in 2004. Because the Yankees are evil.

item.description: One of the nicest features of Bluesky is that every user has an RSS feed, so you can follow people from Bluesky in any RSS-compatible feed reader.
item.source:markdown: One of the nicest features of Bluesky is that every user has an RSS feed, so you can follow people from Bluesky in any RSS-compatible feed reader.

item.description: Imagine that you are a foreign leader who wishes to destroy the United States. How could you do so? The easiest way would be to get Americans to do the work themselves.

item.description: A couple of years ago I begged Elie Mystal to make the abortion chapter of his wonderful book available publicly for free, because it explained the implications of Dobbs so incredibly well and uniquely. Turns they did make it public, I didn't know then so couldn't promote it. Oy!
item.source:markdown: A couple of years ago I begged Elie Mystal to make the abortion chapter of his wonderful book available publicly for free, because it explained the implications of Dobbs so incredibly well and uniquely. Turns they _did_ make it public, I didn't know then so couldn't promote it. Oy!

item.description: Maureen Dowd basically wrote the same piece I just wrote. Trump’s great service may be that we’re finally freed from the control freaks who used to run the Dems. Now somehow we have to survive the insanity that it came with.
item.source:markdown: Maureen Dowd basically wrote the same piece I just wrote. Trump’s great service may be that we’re finally freed from the control freaks who used to run the Dems. Now somehow we have to survive the insanity that it came with.

item.description: A couple of weeks ago I wouldn’t have written this piece for fear of having my life ruined. Now it makes sense to explain why so many men voted for Trump, imho mistakenly, because they were driven away by fear of men. To rebuild, we have to first go through our fear, because it’s the right thing to do, and finally we have no choice,
item.source:markdown: A couple of weeks ago I wouldn’t have written this piece for fear of having my life ruined. Now it makes sense to explain why so many men voted for Trump, imho mistakenly, because they were driven away by fear of men. To rebuild, we have to first go through our fear, because it’s the right thing to do, and finally we have no choice,

item.description: Molly White's OPML subscription list for blogs. Let's start a thing where influencers share their lists, and lets get the feed reader devs let us subscribe to the OPML, so the subscriptions are dynamic. Not hard to implement.
item.source:markdown: Molly White's OPML subscription list for blogs. Let's start a thing where influencers share their lists, and lets get the feed reader devs let us subscribe to the OPML, so the subscriptions are dynamic. Not hard to implement.

item.description: This is the OPML list of podcasts I follow. I keep it updated when I add or remove feeds. You are welcome to use this list, I publish it because I want to bootstrap this practice, of influencers sharing lists of podcasts they recommend. We can make this happen folks. Bootstrapping works.
item.source:markdown: This is the OPML list of podcasts I follow. I keep it updated when I add or remove feeds. You are welcome to use this list, I publish it because I want to bootstrap this practice, of influencers sharing lists of podcasts they recommend. We can make this happen folks. Bootstrapping works.

item.description: Have you seen Bluesky Starter Packs? I want to do that for podcasts. Any client developers want to work with me? I'll create the first one. Let's do it. Send a link to this to the developer of your favorite podcast player app.
item.source:markdown: Have you seen Bluesky Starter Packs? I want to do that for podcasts. Any client developers want to work with me? I'll create the first one. Let's do it. Send a link to this to the developer of your favorite podcast player app.

item.description: This post did not stand up well to history. Written in a previous era, aka six says ago.
item.source:markdown: This post did not stand up well to history. Written in a previous era, aka six says ago.

item.description: The Dems stopped campaigning against Trump after winning the 2020 election and Trump never stopped. They failed to even see this. And it costs so little to keep the party on the air on social web. Highest priority now -- getting back on the air. Such a stupid unforced error. Blind.
item.source:markdown: The Dems stopped campaigning against Trump after winning the 2020 election and Trump never stopped. They failed to even see this. And it costs so little to keep the party on the air on social web. Highest priority now -- getting back on the air. Such a stupid unforced error. Blind.
